QuestData.Title: Think of the Children!
QuestData.Description: When the Shadowmoon attacked Arbor Glen, everything was thrown into chaos.$B$BMany of us escaped, but there are still three children missing.$B$BI believe they are still back in the village.$B$BPlease save them!
QuestData.RewardText: I am glad to hear that the children are safe. They will remember your heroic deeds for their entire lives.
